contextmenu_title.description: Title of the context menu that appears when a right click is done. Inside this parent menu there are the menus

contextmenu_title2.description: Title of the context menu that appears when a right click is done and there's only one language available.

contextmenu_edit.description: Title of the option inside the 'Translate section into...' context menu.

options_introduction.message: Palun valige keeled mida soovite, et kuvaksime "tõlkimise" menüüs.
options_introduction.description: Introduction paragraph to the options pages

options_languageselectheader.description: Header of the language select option.

options_tabsoption_1.message: Ava Google'i tõlge iga tõlke kohta uues vahelehes.
options_tabsoption_1.description: Option which defines how should the app behave in relation to tabs.

options_tabsoption_2.message: Ava Google'i tõlge uues vahelehes ja kirjuta viimase tõlkega see iga kord üle - avamata uusi vahelehti.
options_tabsoption_2.description: Option which defines how should the app behave in relation to tabs.

options_tabsoption_3.message: Ava Google'i tõlge paneelis (selleks tuleb teil aktiveeirda --enable-panels flag). EKSPERIMENTAALNE
options_tabsoption_3.description: Option which defines how should the app behave in relation to tabs.

options_savebutton.description: Save button in the settings page

options_addlanguage_addbutton.description: Add button in the footer of the languages list

options_language_label.description: Label for the language selector in the 'Add language' dialog

options_credits.description: Title for the credits link and dialog

options_credits_homepage.description: Homepage link for an item in the credits. NOTE: put in in lowercase letters

options_credits_by.description: Fragment of the author statement in an item of the credits. NOTE: put in in lowercase letters. EXAMPLE: '{{options_credits_by}} Adrià Vilanova Martínez'

notification_upgradedtostorage_message.message: Nüüd on valikud sünkroonis kõikide teie seadmetega! Halb külg on see, et peate laienduse uuesti seadistama :-( Klikake seadistamiseks sellele teatisele.

notification_reorder_message.message: Nüüd te saate seadistada, millises järjekorras me menüüs teile keeli kuvame.
